title: World EV Day
content: Evolve organized a vibrant EV Day celebration, featuring an engaging quiz competition that tested participants' knowledge about electric vehicles. The event saw active participation, and winners were awarded exciting prizes. It was a great way to raise awareness and foster enthusiasm about the future of sustainable transportation.

title: Gizmocraft
content: Gizmocraft, organized by Evolve, was an exciting tech event featuring an elimination round followed by a hands-on challenge. Selected teams had to design and build a Rube Goldberg machine using waste materials, showcasing creativity and engineering skills. The event encouraged problem-solving, teamwork, and innovation, concluding with awards for the most ingenious designs

title: Electra Expo
content: The exhibition showcased a wide range of projects, including electric cycles, self balancing robots, and pick & drop robotics. Participants had the opportunity to explore the latest projects and learn about the benefits of electric mobility. The exhibition also featured interactive displays and demonstrations, providing a hands-on experience for attendees.
